item.title: Leftists Feign Sympathy For Autistic Babies They’d Happily Abort
item.description: True compassion is equipping women to build strong, healthy pregnancies so fewer problems ever arise — not telling them to end the life of their child...

item.title: Women Are Not Defective Men, No Matter What Feminists Tell You
item.description: Leah Libresco Sargeant’s new book, The Dignity of Dependence , makes a powerful case for celebrating the unique qualities that make women special.

item.title: Here’s What John Wayne Didn’t Teach You About The Great American Gunfighter
item.description: In Bryan Burrough's latest book, The Gunfighters , he sets the record straight on vigilante violence in the Old West.

item.title: My 3rd Grade Lawsuit Proves You’re Never Too Young To Stand Up For Religious Liberty
item.description: Isaiah 7:9 says, 'If you do not stand firm in your faith, you will not stand at all.'

item.title: Trump’s Tylenol Cautions Are Just Common Sense
item.description: If Tylenol kills significantly more people yearly than black forest ham, is it responsible for doctors to encourage pregnant moms to take it?
